name: Pinchcliffe Grand Prix
description:
Pinchcliffe Grand Prix is an adventure-puzzle game developed by Caprino Video Games. It was originally released in 2000. Caprino Video Games published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
Pinchcliffe Grand Prix is available on PC.
It was produced by Ivo Caprino. It was directed by Ivo Caprino. It was scored by Bent Fabric.
